Title: The Lords of Flatbush
Writer: Stephen Verona (screenplay), Gayle Gleckler (screenplay), Martin Davidson (screenplay), Sylvester Stallone (additional dialogue)
Actors: Perry King, Sylvester Stallone, Henry Winkler, Paul Mace
Plot: A group of kids in Brooklyn form a gang. From this moment on they do everything together. This makes things easier but at the same time they have to face new problems.
